Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: genAI was more direct and to the point and gave suggestions whereas teachers feedback was mostly just a certain aspect needs "improving"

Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback made me feel more like i can take action to improve whereas teacher feedback was often just this isn't good enough.
